column1: Kata Robata////This is far the best Japanese restaurant in the town. Considering the amount of selections (with many new ones)
column2: they are still the best! The reason I am writing another review is the new waiter we were most happy to have his service. Mr. Thai Van was someone among that I know only a few fine waiters -we had the pleasure to meet him. His suggestions
column5: his professionalism was certainly at the top. We left the restaurant with nothing but most satisfaction... Congrats to entire team.
